name: Jung Hee Cheon
content: Main 메뉴 건너뛰기 본문시작 Jung Hee Cheon (천정희) Professor, Department of Mathematics in Seoul National University ◉ Biography     ◉ DBLP     ◉ Google Scholar     ◉ Wikipedia     ◉ CryptoLab Research Interests ◉ Fully Homomorphic Encryption     ◉ Lattice-based Cryptography ◉ Lattice Reduction Algorithm          ◉ Integer Factorization & Discrete Logarithm What's new Cryptanalysis on Lightweight Verifiable Homomorphic Encryption with Daehyun Jang, ASIACRYPT 2025 High-Throughput AES Transciphering using CKKS: Less than 1ms with Youngjin Bae, Minsik Kang, Taeseong Kim, WAHC'25 Grafting: Decoupled Scale Factors and Modulus in RNS-CKKS with Hyeongmin Choe, Minsik Kang, Jaehyung Kim, Seonghak Kim, Johannes Mono, Taeyeong Noh, ACM CCS 2025 OverModRaise: Reducing Modulus Consumption of CKKS Bootstrapping with Jihwan Kim, Yongdong Yeo, CiC 2025 Encryption-Friendly LLM Architecture with Donghwan Rho, Taeseong Kim, Minje Park, Jung Woo Kim, Hyunsik Chae, Ernest K Ryu, ICLR 2025 CKKS Curriculum https://ckks.org/ - 연구실에서 중점적으로 연구하는 동형암호 CKKS 스킴에 대한 전반적인 연구들과 최신 동향을 공부합니다. - 상황에 따라서 커리큘럼이 조금씩 달라질 수 있습니다. 1. Basic CKKS a. CKKS Scheme (eprint.iacr.org/2016/421) b. CKKS Bootstrapping (eprint.iacr.org/2018/153, eprint.iacr.org/2018/1043) c. Residue Number System (RNS) Variant CKKS (eprint.iacr.org/2018/931) d. Advanced RNS-CKKS (eprint.iacr.org/2019/688) 2. CKKS Applications a. Matrix Multiplication (eprint.iacr.org/2018/1041, eprint.iacr.org/2024/1284, eprint.iacr.org/2025/448) b. Logistic Regression (eprint.iacr.org/2018/254) c. Large Language Model (arxiv.org/abs/2410.02486) 3. Polynomial Approximation a. Comparison (eprint.iacr.org/2019/1234) b. Domain Extension Functions (eprint.iacr.org/2022/280) c. SoftMax (arxiv.org/abs/2410.11184) d. Look Up Table (eprint.iacr.org/2024/087) 4. Recent Researches a. META-BTS (eprint.iacr.org/2022/1167) b. HERMES (eprint.iacr.org/2023/1244) c. Tuple CKKS (eprint.iacr.org/2023/1788) d. Grafting (eprint.iacr.org/2024/1014) 5. Introduction to FHE a. FHE Survey (eprint.iacr.org/2022/1602)
